officialTitle: Preventing Breast Cancer in Hong Kong Chinese Women Through Personalized Risk Stratification and Characterization: an Epidemiologic Modeling Study and the Development of a Biorepository of Cases and Controls
conditions: Breast Cancer, Ductal Carcinoma In Situ
eligibilityCriteria:
Case Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* aged 18 or above
* Chinese
* Usually residing in Hong Kong (Definition: Having stayed in HK for at least three months during the six months before the reference time-point)
* Able to speak Cantonese
* Newly diagnosed with breast cancer or DCIS in 24 weeks

Case Exclusion Criteria:

* Undergoing treatment for any non-breast cancer

Control Inclusion Criteria

* Female
* aged 18 or above
* Chinese
* Usually residing in Hong Kong
* Able to speak Cantonese

Control Exclusion Criteria

- History of any cancer
